questions.question: How many regions are in Ghana?
questions.answer: There are sixteen(16) regions in Ghana.

questions.question: Can you name them
questions.answer: Upper East, Upper West, North East, Savannah, Northern, Bono East, Bono, Ahafo, Oti, Ashanti, Eastern, Central, Western North, Western, Volta, Greater Accra.

questions.question: Regions of Ghana
questions.answer: Upper East, Upper West, North East, Savannah, Northern, Bono East, Bono, Ahafo, Oti, Ashanti, Eastern, Central, Western North, Western, Volta, Greater Accra.

questions.question: How many days are in a week?
questions.answer: There are seven(7) days in a week.
